i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

participant_2.background:
I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.
I wake up, take my dog, Collie, for a walk and then drink the day away.
I spend time with my family and work on hobbies when I'm not at work.
I spent the week traveling and writing about my experiences.
My most exotic travel experience was when I went to Thailand and saw the floating markets.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a 3d modeler from a small town in the Midwest.
Hey there! I'm a writer and traveler.
Nice to meet you! Where's your favorite place you've traveled to?
I spent last week traveling through Thailand and writing about my experiences. The floating markets were incredible!
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Thailand. What did you do while you were there?
We spent a lot of time exploring the markets and eating delicious food. We also went hiking in the mountains and visited some temples.
Sounds like you had an amazing time! I'm so jealous.
It was a lot of fun! I'm glad I went.
I'm hoping to travel more in the future. Maybe I'll even make it to Thailand one day.
I hope you do! It's a beautiful country.
Thanks! I'm sure I'll have a great time.
